text: Gods of Metal is a 1982 American short documentary film produced by Robert Richter for the Maryknoll Fathers and Brothers on nuclear disarmament. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==References== ==External links== *Gods of Metal at Richter Productions * Category:1982 films Category:1982 short films Category:1982 documentary films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American documentary films Category:Short documentary films
title: Gods of Metal (film)
